summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.3°C) and feels like temperature (down 1.9°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 634 m), light levels (up 2520 lux), and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1584 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 4565 lux) when compared to today.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 1090.6m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and very little to no wind will be present. Drizzle or light rain possible, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and bright intervals likely. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
